name: DarkWikiPedia
description: Tried to 'obsolete' it, but it didn't work. It kept getting cut off, because it was too long (too many data:images). When it's a bit more complete, I'll post it again and put the images on the Web instead. I can't save an empty style either, so I've just put in some basic stuff.

discussions.name: I think its a bit too dark. How about a dark gray?
